channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Almost unusable footpaths, 4th April
item.description:
The footpaths running from Coombe Hill to The Leigh on the A38 are almost unusable. I struggled with the pushchair. They're very uneven, have large potholes, are covered in mud and grass and have brambles protruding out from the hedges. The verges have almost taken over the path in some places.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hillview Cottage A38, Coombe Hill
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A series of potholes which are getting worse., 4th April
item.description:
There are several potholes in a 20 metre length of road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 12 The Lawns, Gotherington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox on verge, 4th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Lansdown Close, Cheltenham

item.title: Two extremely large and dangerous potholes, 4th April
item.description:
Two extremely large, deep, potholes right on blind junction, causing cars to utilize otherside/middle of road on a blind junction. It is unavoidable to prevent hitting at least one of them and they are going to cause some serious issues. Need repairig asap please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 294 Swindon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of potholes, 2nd April
item.description:
These potholes have been here for months now and it’s dangerous when turning into the road. There have been other reports which is why I’ve not reported before but they’ve been there for a long time with no action.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11a Elmfield Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous Potholes Hearne Way, 2nd April
item.description:
Numerous VERY DEEP potholes. Over 75mm deep. Been there far too long. Traffic always parked along one side therefore hard to avoid. Very close to a school and two nursing homes/retirement homes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Hearne Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet
